Description: A personal loan is typically unsecured and can be used for various personal expenses.
A home loan is used to purchase a house and is secured by the property itself.
A car loan is used to purchase a vehicle and is secured by the car.
A student loan is designed to help students pay for post-secondary education expenses.
A mortgage loan is a type of secured loan specifically for purchasing real estate.
A business loan is used to fund a business operation or project.
A payday loan is a short-term loan with a high interest rate, typically due on the borrower's next payday.
A debt consolidation loan combines multiple debts into a single loan with one payment.
A secured loan is backed by collateral to reduce the risk for the lender.
An unsecured loan is not backed by collateral, relying instead on the borrower's creditworthiness.
